summary: In 19th century London, a woman weds a doctor with necrophiliac tendencies, and whose first wife died under mysterious circumstances - and might be coming back from the grave to torment her successor.
cast: Barbara Steele|Robert Flemyng|Silvano Tranquilli|Maria Teresa Vianello|Harriet Medin|Spencer Williams|Al Christianson|Evar Simpson|Nat Harley|Neil Robinson|Howard Nelson Rubien
title: El horrible secreto del doctor Hitchcock
